info.title: ProxyAdminPanel
info.description: X-UI style proxy management system with BFF architecture

post.description:
Admin login endpoint.
Returns JWT token on successful authentication.

schema.title: Response Get All Users Api Users Get
Response Get All Outbounds Api Outbounds Get

post.description:
One-click scan: Automatically create outbounds for all local network interfaces.
This is a key feature for quickly setting up direct outbounds.

schema.title: Response Get All Rules Api Rules Get

get.description:
Get dashboard statistics.
Returns CPU, memory, bandwidth, user counts, and system info.

Download database backup.
Returns the SQLite database file for download.

post.description:
Manually trigger traffic sync from Core Service.
Updates traffic statistics for all users.
Manually check and disable expired users.

Update Core Service configuration.
Updates the .env file with new settings.

Test connection to Core Service.
If config is provided, test with those settings.
Otherwise, test with current settings from .env.

get.description:
Get inventory for all games.
Shows available IPs for each game/rule.
Get inventory for a specific game/rule.

Get detailed usage information for a specific outbound/IP.
Shows which games are using this IP and how many users.

post.description:
Test endpoint to generate username/password based on current patterns.
For shadowsocks (ss), returns an encryption method as username.
For socks5/http, generates username based on pattern.

Query parameter:
- protocol: "socks5", "http", or "ss" (default: "socks5")
